column3: 96 chars max; name and font_path are necessary.

column2: no parent path; filename = name + extension;

column1: If no resolution provided (or it's invalid) - used default value 512.
___ Symbols to generate may be wrapped in "" and can contain indents;
should be represented in hex format with 6 symbols (e.g. 0xFFFF) and
- use 'y' to autogen symbols (everything else considered as "no");
autogen symbols don't contain ASCII symbols (they always
should be stored in separate bitmap). Width data represented as:
int full height (uint32) - including between-line space and
___ localization path is optimal and used for symbols autogen
(it would be scanned for more frequent chars).
name; font path (.ttf); resolution; symbols to generate; autogen('y') or glyph mapping data; localization path;
